title: Piquant lamb

default: 1 large onion, peeled and sliced into thin wedges
225g/8oz carrots, peeled and cut into thick sticks

steps: Place the tomatoes, onion, stock, bay leaves and lamb in a large frying pan.
Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the mushrooms and carrots and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in the tomato purée and capers.
Cook uncovered, over a high heat for 2-4 minutes to reduce some of the liquid.
Remove the bay leaves before serving.
